item.title: Aaronic Priesthood: Arise and Use the Power of God
item.description:
Aaronic Priesthood: Arise and Use the Power of God by undefined Adrián Ochoa, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Evening of 182nd Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2012
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Adrián Ochoa, Second Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency
